abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Charleston County Park and Recreation Commission has made McLeod Plantation, former estate outside of Charleston, SC, into museum; several dealers will offer modern pieces at New York Botanical Garden's Antique Garden Furniture Fair; Stair auction house in Hudson, NY, will offer four paintings by brothers Maurice and Charles Prendergast from collection of Joseph T Butler.
lead_paragraph: A museum on a former estate near Charleston, S.C., will focus on the lives of slaves owned by middle-class farmers.

headline.main: McLeod Plantation Museum Tells the Story of the South
headline.print_headline: Plantation Museum Tells Story of the South

snippet: A museum on a former estate near Charleston, S.C., will focus on the lives of slaves owned by middle-class farmers.
